title: Create your workflow unique for each project

data.title: Sleek user interface
data.description: A sleek and clean user interface keeps you away from any distractions. Filters that allow you to focus on the relevant topics for you. Allow you to choose between light and dark modes based on..

data.title: Free and open source
data.description: Janus is free for both personal and commercial purposes. Get all features necessary to manage an agile project effectively. You can create as many projects and teams as you need without limits.

data.title: Advanced features
data.description: Logically group tasks with the power of custom checklist groups against a task.
